WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,

When dealing with scriptmanager in asp.net webforms, it allows for scripts to be loaded as the debug version or released version

<ajax:ToolkitScriptManager ID="ToolkitScriptManager1" runat="server" ScriptMode="Inherit">
			<CompositeScript>
				<Scripts>                                        
                                         <asp:ScriptReference path="~/Scripts/woo.js" ScriptMode="inherit"/>


Basically the above has a scriptmode inherit, meaning it will be dependent on compilation:
If debug mode then it will try to load woo.debug.js
If release mode it will try to load woo.js

So if I had woo.debug.js how can I get chirpy to name it's minified version as woo.js?

Thanks for your help
WorkItem.Summary: chirpy to name it's minified version
